#summary Really simple code review scheme.

= Introduction =

A much better and simpler code review scheme.

= Details =

  # Create your patch however you want.
  # Check out Caja from svn.
  # Apply your patch to the trunk.
  # Run {{{upload.py -r <reviewers> --send_mail}}}.
  # Note the review number.
  # Respond to comments, edit code.
  # Run {{{upload.py -i <review number> --send_mail}}}.
  # Loop until done.
  # When done, commit with {{{svn ci}}}.
